Description.Text: This comfortable and friendly medium-size hotel with outdoor heated swimming pool is set in a beautifully converted detached Victorian villa built in the 1850s. The hotel has a selection of room types and some of the bedrooms have panoramic south facing sea views showing the whole of Torbay. The hotel offers free car parking facilities for all guests, is centrally located within town and is within half a mile of Torquay's main railway station, the Riviera Conference Centre and Torquay Princess Theatre. An ideal place to stay for both leisure or business. The outdoor heated swimming pool is open from May to end of September each year. Breakfast can be served overlooking the swimming pool.

Located in the heart of Torquay, the hotel has ready access to all the many tourist sights, a full range of shops, a wide selection of restaurants and other facilities that the town has to offer. It is also within a very short walk to the sea front. Located in the heart of Torquay, the hotel has ready access to all the many tourist sights, a full range of shops, a wide selection of restaurants and other facilities that the town has to offer. It is also within a very short walk to the sea front. At the same time the hotel is conveniently located to give guests the option of a quieter break. The hotel is entirely non-smoking throughout including all guest bedrooms.

Compact double - Compact doubles offer one double bed, ideal for a short stay or for a single person. All rooms are non-smoking and include en suite, remote control flat screen televisions, beverage making facilities, radio alarms and hair dryers.
Standard double - Standard doubles offer one double bed. All rooms are non-smoking and include en suite, remote control flat screen televisions, beverage making facilities, radio alarms and hair dryers.
Superior double - Superior doubles offer one double bed, a sitting area and fridge. A Four Poster bed is available on request. All rooms are non-smoking and comfortably and tastefully furnished with matching and complementary dcor. They include full en suite facilities with showers, toilet and washhand basins incorporated. The rooms also have remote control flat screen televisions, beverage making facilities, radio alarms and hair dryers.
Sea view double - Sea view doubles offer one double bed and have magnificent south facing views across the bay. All rooms are non-smoking and comfortably and tastefully furnished with matching and complementary dcor. They include full en suite facilities with showers, toilet and washhand basins incorporated. The rooms also have remote control flat screen televisions, beverage making facilities, radio alarms and hair dryers.
Family room - Our family rooms contain a double bed and bunk beds, as well as a sitting area, 2 en suite bathrooms and sea views. Travel cots can be provided upon request, as well as a microwave for baby food and baby changing facilities. All rooms are non-smoking and comfortably and tastefully furnished with matching and complementary dcor. They include full en suite facilities with showers, toilet and washhand basins incorporated. The rooms also have remote control flat screen televisions, beverage making facilities, radio alarms and hair dryers.
Large family room - Our large family rooms contain a double bed and bunk beds in an adjoining room, as well as a sofa bed in the sitting area, 2 en suite bathrooms and sea views. Travel cots can be provided upon request, as well as a microwave for baby food and baby changing facilities. All rooms are non-smoking and comfortably and tastefully furnished with matching and complementary dcor. They include full en suite facilities with showers, toilet and washhand basins incorporated. The rooms also have remote control flat screen televisions, beverage making facilities, radio alarms and hair dryers.
